words.ex: The committee navigated a labyrinthine set of regulations.
The film’s lachrymose ending left the audience in tears.
His lackadaisical attitude frustrated his colleagues.
Her laconic reply revealed nothing about her true feelings.
The company became a laggard in adopting new technologies.
He lamented the decline of traditional craftsmanship.
A languid breeze drifted through the open window.
The project languished due to lack of funding.
The foundation’s largesse supported dozens of initiatives.
A wave of lassitude swept over him after the long journey.
The data revealed a latent pattern previously unnoticed.
Their efforts to improve transparency were truly laudable.
The book received laudatory reviews from major critics.
They hosted a lavish celebration for the anniversary.
She was leery of signing the contract without legal advice.
The magician’s legerdemain left the audience stunned.
The judge was surprisingly lenient in his sentencing.
He felt lethargic after the long week of travel.
Her levity helped ease the tension in the room.
The field has developed a specialized lexicon over time.
His unpredictability became a liability for the team.
The newspaper faced a lawsuit for libel.
The novel portrays a libertine who rejects all convention.
The critics condemned the film as licentious and gratuitous.
The story explores the liminal space between dream and reality.
Her limpid prose made the complex topic accessible.
The study examined linguistic patterns across dialects.
The media lionized the scientist after her breakthrough.
The dancer moved with lithe elegance across the stage.
The company chose to litigate rather than settle.
He was loath to admit he had made a mistake.
She loathes dishonesty in any form.
The organization set lofty goals for the next decade.
The event posed significant logistical challenges.
The normally reserved guest became surprisingly loquacious.
Her lucid explanation clarified the entire issue.
They secured a lucrative contract with an international client.
The room’s dim lighting gave it a lugubrious atmosphere.
The gentle music lulled the children to sleep.
Her ideas were luminous and ahead of their time.
The tabloids published lurid details of the scandal.
